attributes.action: Stop Boris accepting 20,000 afghans & look after our own for a change
attributes.additional_details: government need to block the 20,000 afghan refugees coming here. And look after our own for a change !!!
attributes.background: Stop or block accepting of 20,000 afghan refugees

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Cancel the Afghan citizens’ resettlement scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595224
